author: Gino Spocchia, Gino Spocchia
title: Coronavirus: Crime plummets across US amid lockdown
description: As Americans stay at home to stop the spread of coronavirus, crime rates have begun to collapse in big cities
content:
Crime has plummeted in some of Americas biggest cities, after millions were ordered to stay at home amid the coronavirus pandemic. 
Without crowded public spaces, transport use and open businesses, criminals have almost nowhere to commit offences. That comes… [+1885 chars]
